actions.name: Mirror Armor

cost.trigger: Another creature applies a negative [Stage Change] effect to the user.

actions.description:
Trigger: Another creature applies a negative [Stage Change] effect to the user.

Effect: The user does not gain the triggering effect and the triggering creature gains it instead with double the duration.
